title: A City's Hidden Scars
goal: Show the blight's impact on a larger community, introducing urban intrigue and the subtle ways corruption can manifest beyond the wilderness.
stakes_shift: The blight is revealed not just as wilderness corruption but a social disease, affecting trust, governance, and the very fabric of urban life.

bridge.from_prev: The group has confronted a physical manifestation of the blight.
bridge.to_next: The search for answers expands from direct observation to ancient texts and scholarly interpretation, requiring new allies.

sections.title: Gates of Sanctuary
sections.intent: The group arrives at a frontier town, initially appearing normal, but with subtle hints of underlying tension.

scenes.summary: They arrive at the fortified gates of Oakhaven, a bustling frontier town, its surface calm belying an undercurrent of unease.
scenes.outcome: The group safely reaches Oakhaven, a seemingly normal but subtly troubled frontier town.

sections.title: Whispers in the Market
sections.intent: Show the social impact of the blight, through rumors and the behavior of the townsfolk.

scenes.summary: In the crowded market, they overhear hushed rumors of strange illnesses, dwindling harvests, and increasing paranoia among the townsfolk.
scenes.outcome: The group discovers the blight's social and economic impact on the town, manifesting as fear and scarcity.

sections.title: Kael's Connections
sections.intent: Use Kael's past to gain access to information or contacts within the town.

scenes.summary: Kael uses old contacts to gather information, revealing a growing discontent with the local lord and strange new decrees.
scenes.outcome: Kael's contacts reveal unsettling political tensions and strange new laws within Oakhaven.
